webdriver manager will take care of the rest Scenario: Verify that user can successfully register with suitable credentials. # email_validation.feature:6 Given User opens Check24 WebPage # New_RegistrationSteps.user_opens_check24_webpage() When User navigates to registration page # New_RegistrationSteps.user_navigates_to_registration_page() Then User can see email area # New_RegistrationSteps.user_can_see_email_area() Given User is on registiration page # New_RegistrationSteps.user_is_on_registiration_page() And User enters a randomly generated email # New_RegistrationSteps.user_enters_a_randomly_generated_email() And User enters Password as "9876Strong!" # New_RegistrationSteps.user_enters_password_as_something(String) And User enters Repeating Password as "9876Strong!" # New_RegistrationSteps.user_enters_repeating_password_as_something(String) And User clicks on the submit button # New_RegistrationSteps.user_clicks_on_the_submit_button()
